remarks: Two vector subtractions simultaneously commute in an inner product. (Contributed by NM, 1-Jul-2005.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
hisubcom.1 $e |- A e. ~H $.
hisubcom.2 $e |- B e. ~H $.
hisubcom.3 $e |- C e. ~H $.
hisubcom.4 $e |- D e. ~H $.
hisubcomi $p |- ( ( A -h B ) .ih ( C -h D ) ) = ( ( B -h A ) .ih ( D -h C ) ) $.
